lceui.viewedBlock.notFound: Block or LCE UI tag '%s' is unknown or has not been seen yet
options.lceui.requiresOtherOptionAndRest: Requires '%s' and a restart to function correctly
options.lceui.requiresRestart: Requires a restart to function correctly
options.lceui.general.whatsThis.tooltip: Enables short descriptions about blocks/entities as you encounter them.
options.lceui.general.tooltips.tooltip: Makes the tooltip rendering similar to LCE.
options.lceui.general.textShadows.toolti: Makes the text shadow render 1/3 of a pixel down and to the right rather than a full pixel
options.lceui.screens.hideHudWhenInUI.to: Hides the hotbar and crosshair when you are in a different UI, such as chest or pause menu, like LCE
options.lceui.screens.removeTransparentB: Removes dark background when in UI's
options.lceui.panorama.legacyPanorama.to: Makes the panorama a 2D scrolling texture, like LCE.
options.lceui.panorama.l4jpansupport.too: Prioritises L4J Panorama textures over LCEUI's
block.minecraft.light.description: An invisible block used to create light.
block.minecraft.stone.description: Can be mined with a pickaxe to collect cobblestone.
block.minecraft.granite.description: Can be mined with a pickaxe to collect granite.
block.minecraft.polished_granite.descrip: Can be crafted from granite for a polished look.
block.minecraft.diorite.description: Can be mined with a pickaxe to collect diorite.
block.minecraft.polished_diorite.descrip: Can be crafted from diorite for a polished look.
block.minecraft.andesite.description: Can be mined with a pickaxe to collect andesite.
block.minecraft.polished_andesite.descri: Can be crafted from andesite for a polished look.
block.minecraft.hay_block.description: Can be fed to Horses, Donkeys, Mules, and Llamas to heal up to 10 Hearts. Speeds up the growth of foals.
block.minecraft.grass_block.description: A block of dirt with grass growing on top. Collected using a shovel. Can be used for construction.
block.minecraft.dirt.description: Collected using a shovel. Can be used for construction.
block.minecraft.coarse_dirt.description: A special type of dirt that does not grow grass.
block.minecraft.podzol.description: Similar to Dirt Blocks, but very good for growing mushrooms on.
block.minecraft.cobblestone.description: Mined from stone using a pickaxe. Can be used to construct a furnace or stone tools.
block.minecraft.planks.description: Used as a building material and can be crafted into many things. Can be crafted from any form of wood.
block.minecraft.sapling.description: Can be planted and will eventually grow into a tree.
block.minecraft.door.description: Wooden doors are activated by using, hitting them or with Redstone.
block.minecraft.water.description: Extinguishes fire and helps crops grow. Can be collected in a bucket.
block.minecraft.lava.description: Sets fire to anything that touches it. Can be collected in a bucket.
block.minecraft.sand.description: Collected using a shovel. Can be smelted into glass using the furnace. Is affected by gravity if there is no other tile underneath it.
block.minecraft.red_sand.description: A red colored sand that can be found in mesas. Can be smelted into glass using the furnace. Is affected by gravity if there is no other block underneath it.
block.minecraft.sandstone.description: Used as a building material. Is not influenced by gravity like normal Sand.
block.minecraft.red_sandstone.descriptio: Red colored Sandstone. It is not influenced by gravity like normal Sand.
block.minecraft.gravel.description: Collected using a shovel. Sometimes produces flint when dug up. Is affected by gravity if there is no other tile underneath it.
block.minecraft.gold_ore.description: Can be mined with an iron pickaxe or better, then smelted in a furnace to produce gold ingots.
block.minecraft.nether_gold_ore.descript: Can be mined with a pickaxe to collect gold nuggets.
block.minecraft.iron_ore.description: Can be mined with a stone pickaxe or better, then smelted in a furnace to produce iron ingots.
block.minecraft.coal_ore.description: Can be mined with a pickaxe to collect coal.
block.minecraft.wood.description: Crafted from Logs. Can be crafted into planks, used as a fuel, or stripped with an axe.
block.minecraft.log.description: Chopped using an axe, and can be crafted into planks or used as a fuel.
block.minecraft.mangrove_roots.descripti: Grows from Mangrove trees and can be filled with water.
block.minecraft.muddy_mangrove_roots.des: Crafted from Mangrove Roots and Mud. Can be used as decoration.
block.minecraft.stripped_oak_log.descrip: An Oak log that has had the bark removed with an axe.
block.minecraft.stripped_spruce_log.desc: A Spruce log that has had the bark removed with an axe.
block.minecraft.stripped_birch_log.descr: A Birch log that has had the bark removed with an axe.
block.minecraft.stripped_jungle_log.desc: A Jungle log that has had the bark removed with an axe.
block.minecraft.stripped_acacia_log.desc: An Acacia log that has had the bark removed with an axe.
block.minecraft.stripped_dark_oak_log.de: A Dark Oak log that has had the bark removed with an axe.
block.minecraft.stripped_mangrove_log.de: A Mangrove log that has had the bark removed with an axe.
block.minecraft.stripped_oak_wood.descri: Oak wood that has had the bark removed with an axe.
block.minecraft.stripped_spruce_wood.des: Spruce wood that has had the bark removed with an axe.
block.minecraft.stripped_birch_wood.desc: Birch wood that has had the bark removed with an axe.
block.minecraft.stripped_jungle_wood.des: Jungle wood that has had the bark removed with an axe.
block.minecraft.stripped_acacia_wood.des: Acacia wood that has had the bark removed with an axe.
block.minecraft.stripped_dark_oak_wood.d: A Dark Oak log that has had the bark removed with an axe.
block.minecraft.stripped_mangrove_wood.d: Mangrove wood that has had the bark removed with an axe.
block.minecraft.leaves.description: When broken, sometimes drops a sapling which can be replanted to grow into a tree.
block.minecraft.mangrove_leaves.descript: Grows from Mangrove trees and can be collected with shears. Can be used as decoration.
block.minecraft.grass.description: Sometimes produces wheat seeds when broken.
block.minecraft.sponge.description: Can absorb water nearby, turning into a wet sponge in the process.
block.minecraft.wet_sponge.description: Can be dried in a furnace, allowing the sponge to be reused.
block.minecraft.glass.description: Created in a furnace by smelting sand. Can be used for construction, but will break if you try to mine it.
block.minecraft.kelp.description: Can be planted in water, or dried in a Furnace and eaten.
block.minecraft.dried_kelp_block.descrip: Made of 9 Dried Kelp. Can be used as fuel in a Furnace.
block.minecraft.stained_glass.descriptio: Crafted from glass and a dye.
block.minecraft.glass_pane.description: Transparent blocks that can be used as an alternative to Glass Blocks.
block.minecraft.dandelion.description: A common yellow flower that can be used to craft yellow dye. Can also be used to breed and lead rabbits.
block.minecraft.poppy.description: A common red flower that can be used to craft red dye.
block.minecraft.blue_orchid.description: A rare blue flower that can be used to craft light blue dye.
block.minecraft.allium.description: A rare magenta flower that can be used to craft magenta dye.
block.minecraft.azure_bluet.description: A small white flower that can be used to craft light gray dye.
block.minecraft.red_tulip.description: A small red flower that can be used to craft red dye.
block.minecraft.orange_tulip.description: A small orange flower that can be used to craft orange dye.
block.minecraft.white_tulip.description: A small white flower that can be used to craft light gray dye.
block.minecraft.pink_tulip.description: A small pink flower that can be used to craft pink dye.
block.minecraft.oxeye_daisy.description: A common white and yellow flower that can be used to craft light gray dye.
block.minecraft.cornflower.description: A small blue flower that can be used to craft blue dye.
block.minecraft.lily_of_the_valley.descr: A small white flower that can be used to craft white dye.
block.minecraft.wither_rose.description: A dangerous flower that grows from mobs killed by the Wither.
block.minecraft.sunflower.description: A tall yellow flower that can be used to craft yellow dye.
block.minecraft.lilac.description: A tall purple flower that can be used to craft magenta dye.
block.minecraft.tall_grass.description: Double tall grass that can sometimes drop seeds.
block.minecraft.large_fern.description: A tall fern that can sometimes drop seeds.
block.minecraft.rose_bush.description: A tall red flower that can be used to craft red dye.
block.minecraft.peony.description: A tall green and pink flower that can be used to craft pink dye.
block.minecraft.seagrass.description: Grows at the bottom of the Ocean. Can be collected with Shears and used to breed Sea Turtles.
block.minecraft.sea_pickle.description: Small animals that generate light when underwater. Can be found in Warm Oceans.
block.minecraft.mushroom.description: Can be crafted with a bowl to make stew.
block.minecraft.gold_block.description: A compact way of storing Gold.
block.minecraft.iron_block.description: A compact way of storing Iron.
block.minecraft.smooth_stone.description: Can be used to create Smooth Stone Slabs
block.minecraft.slab.description: Used for making long staircases. Two slabs placed on top of each other will create a normal-sized double slab block.
block.minecraft.bricks.description: Baked from clay in a furnace.
block.minecraft.tnt.description: Used to cause explosions. Activated after placing by igniting with Flint and Steel item, or with an electrical charge.
block.minecraft.bookshelf.description: Allows the creation of more powerful enchantments when placed around the Enchantment Table.
block.minecraft.mossy_cobblestone.descri: Found in dungeons. Can be used for construction and decoration.
block.minecraft.obsidian.description: Can only be mined with a diamond pickaxe. Is produced by the meeting of water and still lava, and is used to build Nether portals.
block.minecraft.torch.description: Used to create light. Torches also melt snow and ice.
block.minecraft.soul_torch.description: An alternate, dimmer torch made with a soul block that can be used to scare away Piglins.
block.minecraft.respawn_anchor.descripti: Can be charged with Glowstone blocks in the Nether to change your spawn point.
block.minecraft.chest.description: Stores blocks and items inside. Place two chests side by side to create a larger chest with double the capacity.
block.minecraft.trapped_chest.descriptio: Stores blocks and items inside. Place two chests side by side to create a larger chest with double capacity. A trapped chest also creates a Redstone charge when opened.
block.minecraft.diamond_ore.description: Can be mined with an iron pickaxe or better to collect diamonds.
block.minecraft.coal_block.description: A compact way of storing Coal. Can be used as fuel in a Furnace.
block.minecraft.diamond_block.descriptio: A compact way of storing Diamonds.
block.minecraft.crafting_table.descripti: Allows you to craft a more varied selection of items than the normal crafting.
block.minecraft.wheat.description: When fully grown, crops can be harvested to collect wheat.
block.minecraft.farmland.description: Ground that has been prepared ready to plant seeds.
block.minecraft.furnace.description: Allows you to smelt ore, create charcoal and glass, and cook fish and porkchops.
block.minecraft.sign.description: Shows text entered by you or other players.
block.minecraft.stone_pressure_plate.des: A pressure sensitive pad that will activate when heavy mobs or the player step on it.
block.minecraft.oak_pressure_plate.descr: A sensitive Oak pressure plate that can be activated by applying almost any amount of pressure.
block.minecraft.spruce_pressure_plate.de: A sensitive Spruce pressure plate that can be activated by applying almost any amount of pressure.
block.minecraft.birch_pressure_plate.des: A sensitive Birch pressure plate that can be activated by applying almost any amount of pressure.
block.minecraft.jungle_pressure_plate.de: A sensitive Jungle wood pressure plate that can be activated by applying almost any amount of pressure.
block.minecraft.acacia_pressure_plate.de: A sensitive Acacia pressure plate that can be activated by applying almost any amount of pressure.
A sensitive Dark Oak pressure plate that can be activated by applying almost any amount of pressure.
A sensitive Mangrove pressure plate that can be activated by applying almost any amount of pressure.
block.minecraft.cherry_pressure_plate.de: A sensitive Cherry pressure plate that can be activated by applying almost any amount of pressure.
block.minecraft.bamboo_pressure_plate.de: A sensitive Bamboo pressure plate that can be activated by applying almost any amount of pressure.
block.minecraft.light_weighted_pressure_: Provides a Redstone charge. The charge will be stronger if more items are on the plate.
block.minecraft.heavy_weighted_pressure_: Provides a Redstone charge. The charge will be stronger if more items are on the plate. Requires more weight than the light plate.
block.minecraft.iron_door.description: Iron doors can only be opened by Redstone, buttons or switches.
block.minecraft.redstone_ore.description: Can be mined with an iron pickaxe or better to collect redstone dust.
block.minecraft.redstone_torch.descripti: Constantly sends an electrical charge, or can be used as a receiver/transmitter when connected to the side of a block. Can also be used for low-level lighting.
block.minecraft.button.description: Used to send an electrical charge by being pressed. Stays activated for approximately a second before shutting off again.
block.minecraft.snow.description: Can be dug with a shovel to create snowballs.
block.minecraft.carpet.description: Crafted from Wool. Used as a decoration.
block.minecraft.ice.description: Slippery when walked on. Turns into water if above another block when destroyed. Melts if close enough to a light source or when placed in The Nether.
block.minecraft.frosted_ice.description: A type of ice that melts quickly.
block.minecraft.packed_ice.description: A solid unmeltable block of ice that can have objects placed on it.
block.minecraft.blue_ice.description: Crafted from 9 Packed Ice blocks. Blue Ice is even more slippery!
block.minecraft.cactus.description: Can be cooked in a furnace to create a green dye.
block.minecraft.clay.description: When broken drops clay balls which can be baked into bricks in a furnace.
block.minecraft.colored_terracotta.descr: Colorful blocks crafted by dyeing Terracotta.
block.minecraft.terracotta.description: Created by smelting Clay in a furnace.
block.minecraft.sugar_cane.description: Can be crafted to create sugar.
block.minecraft.fence.description: Used as a barrier that cannot be jumped over. Counts as 1.5 blocks high for players, animals and monsters, but 1 block high for other blocks.
block.minecraft.fence_gate.description: Similar to a door, but used primarily with fences.
block.minecraft.pumpkin.description: Can be carved with shears to create a Carved Pumpkin. It is also the main ingredient in Pumpkin Pie.
block.minecraft.carved_pumpkin.descripti: Can be worn as a helmet or crafted with a torch to create a Jack-O-Lantern.
block.minecraft.jack_o_lantern.descripti: Used to create brighter light than torches. Melts snow/ice and can be used underwater.
block.minecraft.soul_sand.description: Slows the movement of anything walking over it.
block.minecraft.glowstone.description: Used to create brighter light than torches. Melts snow/ice and can be used underwater.
block.minecraft.wool.description: Collected from sheep, and can be colored with dyes.
block.minecraft.lapis_ore.description: Can be mined with a stone pickaxe or better to collect lapis lazuli.
block.minecraft.lapis_block.description: A compact way of storing Lapis Lazuli.
block.minecraft.dispenser.description: Used to hold and shoot out items in a random order when given a Redstone charge.
block.minecraft.dropper.description: Used to hold and drop items, or push items into another container, when given a Redstone charge.
block.minecraft.note_block.description: Plays a note when triggered. Hit it to change the pitch of the note. Placing this on top of different blocks will change the type of instrument.
block.minecraft.trapdoor.description: Activated by using, hitting them or with redstone. They function as normal doors, but are a one by one block and lay flat on the ground.
block.minecraft.iron_trapdoor.descriptio: Iron trapdoors can only be opened by Redstone, buttons or switches.
block.minecraft.cobweb.description: Slows movement when walking through it. Can be destroyed using shears to collect string.
block.minecraft.stone_bricks.description: Made from stone blocks. Commonly found in Strongholds.
block.minecraft.packed_mud.description: Crafted from Mud and Wheat. Can be used to craft Mud Bricks or be used for construction.
block.minecraft.mud_bricks.description: Crafted from Mud. Can be used for construction.
block.minecraft.infested_stone.descripti: Spawns a Silverfish when destroyed. May also spawn Silverfish if nearby to another Silverfish being attacked.
block.minecraft.piston.description: When powered (using a button, a lever, a pressure plate, a redstone torch, or redstone with any one of these), a piston extends if it can and pushes blocks.
block.minecraft.sticky_piston.descriptio: When powered (using a button, a lever, a pressure plate, a redstone torch, or redstone with any one of these), a piston extends if it can and pushes blocks. When it retracts it pulls back the block touching the extended part of the piston.
block.minecraft.lever.description: Used to send an electrical charge by being turned on or off. Stays in the on or off state until pressed again.
block.minecraft.iron_bars.description: Used as a barrier, similar to fences.
block.minecraft.melon.description: Can be crafted from Melon Slices.
block.minecraft.vine.description: Grows over time when placed. Can be collected using shears. Can be climbed like a ladder.
block.minecraft.nether_bricks.descriptio: Used to build Nether Fortresses. Immune to Ghast's fireballs.
block.minecraft.nether_wart.description: Found in Nether Fortresses. Will drop Nether Wart when broken.
block.minecraft.warped_wart_block.descri: Harvested from huge warped fungi in the Nether. Can be used as decoration.
block.minecraft.stripped_warped_stem.des: A Warped stem that has had the bark removed with an axe.
block.minecraft.hyphae.description: Crafted from Stems. Can be crafted into planks or stripped with an axe.
block.minecraft.stripped_warped_hyphae.d: Warped hyphae that has had the bark removed with an axe.
block.minecraft.nether_stem.description: Chopped using an axe, and can be crafted into planks.
block.minecraft.stripped_crimson_stem.de: A Crimson stem that has had the bark removed with an axe.
Crimson hyphae that has had the bark removed with an axe.
block.minecraft.nylium.description: A grass block-like type of Netherrack that generates in the Nether. Ideal for planting mushrooms.
block.minecraft.warped_fungus.descriptio: Found in the Nether. Scares Hoglins away and can be used to breed Striders.
block.minecraft.crimson_fungus.descripti: Found in the Nether. Can be used to breed Hoglins.
block.minecraft.crimson_roots.descriptio: Found in the Nether. Can be used as decoration.
block.minecraft.warped_roots.description: Found in Warped Forests. Can be used as decoration.
block.minecraft.nether_sprouts.descripti: Found in Warped Forests. Can be harvested with shears and be used as decoration.
block.minecraft.shroomlight.description: A light source that can be harvested from huge fungi.
block.minecraft.weeping_vines.descriptio: A plant found in Crimson Forests in the Nether. Grows downwards and can be climbed on.
block.minecraft.twisting_vines.descripti: A plant found in Warped Forests in the Nether. Grows upwards and can be climbed on.
block.minecraft.soul_soil.description: Found in the Nether. Can be used for construction. Makes you walk faster on it if your boots have the Soul Speed enchantment.
block.minecraft.basalt.description: An igneous rock found in the Nether. Can be used for construction.
block.minecraft.polished_basalt.descript: Can be crafted from Basalt for a more polished look.
block.minecraft.warped_planks.descriptio: Used as a building material and can be crafted into many things. Can be crafted from Warped stems and hyphae.
block.minecraft.warped_pressure_plate.de: A sensitive Warped pressure plate that can be activated by applying almost any amount of pressure.
block.minecraft.crimson_planks.descripti: Used as a building material and can be crafted into many things. Can be crafted from Crimson stems and hyphae.
block.minecraft.crimson_pressure_plate.d: A sensitive Crimson pressure plate that can be activated by applying almost any amount of pressure.
block.minecraft.soul_fire.description: A type of fire that deals double the damage of normal fire.
block.minecraft.cauldron.description: Used to mix dyes and dye armor, or store Potions and make Tipped Arrows. Filled with water by rain or with a bucket of water.
block.minecraft.enchanting_table.descrip: This allows players to enchant Swords, Pickaxes, Axes, Shovels, Bows, and Armor, using the player's Experience Points.
block.minecraft.anvil.description: Can be used to repair weapons, tools and armor.
block.minecraft.end_stone.description: A block type found in The End. It has a very high blast resistance, and so is useful for building with.
block.minecraft.end_portal_frame.descrip: Used to form an End Portal.
block.minecraft.mycelium.description: Similar to Grass Blocks, but very good for growing mushrooms on.
block.minecraft.lily_pad.description: Floats on water, and can be walked on.
block.minecraft.dragon_egg.description: This block is created by the defeat of the Dragon in The End.
block.minecraft.cocoa.description: Can be farmed to collect Cocoa Beans.
block.minecraft.ender_chest.description: Similar to a Chest except that items placed in an Ender Chest are available in every one of the player's Ender Chests, even in different dimensions.
block.minecraft.emerald_ore.description: Can be mined with an Iron pickaxe or better to collect Emeralds.
block.minecraft.emerald_block.descriptio: A compact way of storing Emeralds.
block.minecraft.redstone_block.descripti: Used as a redstone power source. Can be crafted back into Redstone.
block.minecraft.tripwire.description: Activates a connected Tripwire Hook when an entity passes through it.
block.minecraft.tripwire_hook.descriptio: Is activated when an entity passes through a connected Tripwire.
block.minecraft.beacon.description: Projects a beam of light into the sky, and can provide Status Effects to nearby players.
block.minecraft.daylight_detector.descri: A block that outputs a Redstone signal based on sunlight or lack of sunlight if inverted.
block.minecraft.nether_quartz_ore.descri: Can be mined with a pickaxe to collect Nether Quartz.
block.minecraft.hopper.description: Used to catch items or to transfer items into and out of containers.
block.minecraft.slime_block.description: Causes players and mobs to bounce when they jump on it.
block.minecraft.prismarine.description: Rare decorative stone that can be found in Ocean Monuments. Can be crafted from Prismarine shards.
block.minecraft.prismarine_bricks.descri: Decorative Prismarine brick that can be found in Ocean Monuments. Can be crafted from Prismarine shards.
block.minecraft.dark_prismarine.descript: A rarer form of Prismarine that can be found in Ocean Monuments. Can be crafted with Prismarine shards and an Ink Sac.
block.minecraft.sea_lantern.description: Underwater light sources that can be found in Ocean Monuments. Can be crafted from Prismarine shards and Prismarine crystals.
block.minecraft.end_rod.description: A decorative light source found in End Cities. Can be crafted using Blaze Rods and Popped Chorus Fruit.
block.minecraft.chorus_plant.description: Grows from Chorus Flowers. Sometimes drops Chorus Fruit when destroyed.
block.minecraft.chorus_flower.descriptio: Can be planted on End Stone to grow more Chorus Flowers, and Chorus Plants.
block.minecraft.purpur_block.description: Can be mined with a pickaxe, or crafted using Popped Chorus Fruit.
block.minecraft.purpur_pillar.descriptio: Can be mined with a pickaxe, or crafted using Purpur Slabs.
block.minecraft.end_stone_bricks.descrip: Crafted from End Stone. Can be used as decoration.
block.minecraft.dirt_path.description: A decorative block that can be created by using a shovel on a Grass Block.
block.minecraft.magma_block.description: Causes fire damage when you stand on it.
block.minecraft.nether_wart_block.descri: A decorative block crafted from Nether Wart.
block.minecraft.red_nether_bricks.descri: Crafted from Nether Wart and Nether Brick. Can be used as decoration.
block.minecraft.bone_block.description: Crafted from Bone Meal, or found underground in fossils. Can be used as decoration.
block.minecraft.observer.description: Emits a redstone signal when adjacent blocks are updated.
block.minecraft.shulker_box.description: A special kind of chest that can contain items even when broken. Can be crafted using a Chest and Shulker Shells.
A decorative block created by baking White Terracotta in a Furnace.
block.minecraft.orange_glazed_terracotta: A decorative block created by baking Orange Terracotta in a Furnace.
block.minecraft.magenta_glazed_terracott: A decorative block created by baking Magenta Terracotta in a Furnace.
block.minecraft.light_blue_glazed_terrac: A decorative block created by baking Light Blue Terracotta in a Furnace.
block.minecraft.yellow_glazed_terracotta: A decorative block created by baking Yellow Terracotta in a Furnace.
block.minecraft.lime_glazed_terracotta.d: A decorative block created by baking Lime Terracotta in a Furnace.
block.minecraft.pink_glazed_terracotta.d: A decorative block created by baking Pink Terracotta in a Furnace.
block.minecraft.gray_glazed_terracotta.d: A decorative block created by baking Gray Terracotta in a Furnace.
block.minecraft.light_gray_glazed_terrac: A decorative block created by baking Light Gray Terracotta in a Furnace.
block.minecraft.cyan_glazed_terracotta.d: A decorative block created by baking Cyan Terracotta in a Furnace.
block.minecraft.purple_glazed_terracotta: A decorative block created by baking Purple Terracotta in a Furnace.
block.minecraft.blue_glazed_terracotta.d: A decorative block created by baking Blue Terracotta in a Furnace.
A decorative block created by baking Brown Terracotta in a Furnace.
A decorative block created by baking Green Terracotta in a Furnace.
block.minecraft.red_glazed_terracotta.de: A decorative block created by baking Red Terracotta in a Furnace.
A decorative block created by baking Black Terracotta in a Furnace.
block.minecraft.concrete.description: Can be mined with a pickaxe, or created when Concrete Powder comes into contact with a Water block.
block.minecraft.concrete_powder.descript: Turns into Concrete after coming into contact with a Water block.
block.minecraft.turtle_egg.description: Laid on Sand blocks by Sea Turtles, and will hatch at night after a while. Very fragile!
block.minecraft.snow_block.description: A compact way to store snowballs.
block.minecraft.end_portal.description: This can be activated using twelve Eye of Ender, and will allow the player to travel to The End dimension.
block.minecraft.mob_head.description: Mob Heads can be placed as a decoration, or worn as a mask in the helmet slot.
block.minecraft.end_gateway.description: This block is created by the defeat of the Dragon in The End.
block.minecraft.structure_void.descripti: Used to ignore blocks when saving structures in Structure Blocks.
block.minecraft.structure_block.descript: Used to save and load structures.
block.minecraft.void_air.description: Air generated deep in the world.
block.minecraft.coral_block.description: A decorative block that can be found in Warm Oceans, and mined with a Pickaxe. Coral blocks will die if not touching water.
block.minecraft.dead_coral_block.descrip: A Coral block that is dried out and dead.
block.minecraft.coral.description: A decorative block that can be found in Coral Reefs. Can only be placed underwater.
block.minecraft.dead_coral.description: Coral that is dried out and dead.
block.minecraft.coral_fan.description: A decorative block that can be found in Coral Reefs. Can be placed on the sides of blocks.
block.minecraft.dead_coral_fan.descripti: A Coral Fan that is dried out and dead.
block.minecraft.loom.description: A Loom can be used to dye Banners more efficiently than Crafting Tables.
block.minecraft.conduit.description: Gives nearby players a powerful status effect if they are in water or rain.
block.minecraft.bamboo.description: Pandas love to eat Bamboo, and you can use it to build Scaffolding.
block.minecraft.composter.description: The Composter can be used to recycle various plant and food items to produce Bone Meal.
block.minecraft.jigsaw.description: Used to construct structures out of smaller templates.
block.minecraft.target.description: Emits a Redstone signal when shot with an arrow.
block.minecraft.mud_brick_wall.descripti: A wall made of Mud Bricks.
block.minecraft.nether_brick_wall.descri: A wall made of Nether Bricks.
block.minecraft.red_nether_brick_wall.de: A wall made of Nether Bricks.
block.minecraft.barrel.description: The Barrel can be used to store items like a chest.
block.minecraft.smoker.description: The Smoker can be used to cook food items faster than a furnace can.
block.minecraft.blast_furnace.descriptio: The Blast Furnace can be used to smelt ores faster than a furnace can.
block.minecraft.cartography_table.descri: The Cartography Table provides a simpler way of cloning and creating maps.
block.minecraft.fletching_table.descript: Fletching Tables are Villager work stations that appear within villages.
block.minecraft.smithing_table.descripti: Smithing Tables are Villager work stations that appear within villages.
block.minecraft.grindstone.description: The Grindstone can be used to restore durability and disenchant equipment.
block.minecraft.lectern.description: A lectern is a block found in villages, it can be used to hold books for multiple players to read in multiplayer.
block.minecraft.stonecutter.description: The Stonecutter can be used to craft stone related items.
block.minecraft.bell.description: Use the Bell to alert villagers of nearby danger.
block.minecraft.scaffolding.description: Scaffolding can help you create huge structures safely! You can walk inside scaffolding and stand on it.
block.minecraft.lantern.description: Lanterns can be placed either hanging under a block or on top of a block. It gives slightly more light than the torch.
block.minecraft.soul_lantern.description: An alternate, dimmer lantern made with a soul block that can be used to scare away Piglins.
block.minecraft.sweet_berry_bush.descrip: A thorny bush that grows edible Sweet Berries!
block.minecraft.campfire.description: The Campfire can be used to cook food or act as a light source or smoke signal.
block.minecraft.soul_campfire.descriptio: An alternate, dimmer campfire made with a soul block that can be used to scare away Piglins.
block.minecraft.beehive.description: An artificial alternative to the Bee Nest crafted with 3 Honeycombs and 6 Planks.
block.minecraft.bee_nest.description: A block that shelters bees and stores their honey. Generates under Oak, Birch, and Mangrove trees.
block.minecraft.honey_block.description: A sticky block that stops entities from jumping when on it. Does not stick to Slime Blocks.
block.minecraft.honeycomb_block.descript: Crafted with 4 Honeycombs. Can be used as decoration.
block.minecraft.lodestone.description: Alters the position where a compass will point to.
block.minecraft.netherite_block.descript: A compact way of storing Netherite.
block.minecraft.ancient_debris.descripti: A rare ore found in the depths of the Nether. Can be forged into Netherite Scrap. Does not burn in lava or fire.
block.minecraft.crying_obsidian.descript: A special luminous variant of Obsidian. Can be used to craft a Respawn Anchor or as decoration.
block.minecraft.blackstone.description: Found in the Nether. Can be used to construct a furnace or stone tools.
block.minecraft.polished_blackstone.desc: Made from Blackstone. Also found in Bastion Remnants. Can be used for construction.
block.minecraft.polished_blackstone_bric: A wall made of Polished Blackstone Bricks.
block.minecraft.gilded_blackstone.descri: A special type of Blackstone that contains gold in it. Mining it may drop itself or gold nuggets.
block.minecraft.polished_blackstone_wall: A wall made of Polished Blackstone.
block.minecraft.cracked_nether_bricks.de: Created by smelting Nether Bricks in a furnace. Can be used for construction.
block.minecraft.chiseled_nether_bricks.d: Crafted with Nether Brick Slabs. Can be used for construction.
block.minecraft.chain.description: Can be hung in a ceiling or wall as decoration or to support a Lantern.
block.minecraft.candle.description: Can be placed in a cake or on the floor as decoration.
block.minecraft.colored_candle.descripti: Created by mixing dye with a Candle.
block.minecraft.amethyst_block.descripti: Generated as part of Amethyst Geodes. Can be used as decoration.
block.minecraft.small_amethyst_bud.descr: Will grow into a Medium Amethyst Bud. Can also be used as decoration.
block.minecraft.medium_amethyst_bud.desc: Will grow into a Large Amethyst Bud. Can also be used as decoration.
block.minecraft.large_amethyst_bud.descr: Will grow into an Amethyst Cluster that can be mined for Amethyst Shards. Can also be used as decoration.
block.minecraft.amethyst_cluster.descrip: Can be mined for Amethyst Shards or used as decoration.
block.minecraft.budding_amethyst.descrip: Generates Amethyst Clusters over time. Will not drop if mined.
block.minecraft.calcite.description: Generated as part of Amethyst Geodes. Can be used as decoration.
block.minecraft.tuff.description: Generated as part of Amethyst Geodes. Can be used as decoration.
block.minecraft.tinted_glass.description: A type of glass that does not let light through it.
block.minecraft.dripstone_block.descript: Found in Dripstone Caves. Can be used as decoration.
block.minecraft.pointed_dripstone.descri: Found in Dripstone Caves. Will grow if placed under a Dripstone Block with water on top.
block.minecraft.copper_ore.description: Can be mined with a stone pickaxe or better to collect raw copper.
block.minecraft.copper_block.description: Crafted from Copper. Can be used as decoration and construction.
block.minecraft.waxed_copper_block.descr: A Copper block that does not oxidize.
block.minecraft.cave_vines.description: A glowing plant that grows Glow Berries. Found in Lush Caves.
block.minecraft.spore_blossom.descriptio: Releases cosmetic spores over time. Found in Lush Caves.
block.minecraft.azalea.description: Found in Lush Caves and drops from Azalea Leaves. Can be grown to an Azalea tree.
block.minecraft.flowering_azalea.descrip: Found in Lush Caves and drops from Flowering Azalea Leaves. Can be grown to an Azalea tree.
block.minecraft.moss_carpet.description: Generates in Lush Caves. Can be used as decoration.
block.minecraft.moss_block.description: Generates in Lush Caves and can be spread with Bone Meal.
block.minecraft.big_dripleaf.description: Generates in Lush Caves. Tilts down when an entity stands on it.
block.minecraft.small_dripleaf.descripti: Generates in Lush Caves. Can be grown into a Big Dripleaf or be used as decoration.
block.minecraft.rooted_dirt.description: A Dirt Block with roots from an Azalea tree. Can be used as decoration.
block.minecraft.mud.description: Generates in Mangrove forests. Can be used for construction.
block.minecraft.hanging_roots.descriptio: Grows by using Bone Meal under Rooted Dirt, or can be acquired from tilling it. Can be used as decoration.
block.minecraft.powder_snow.description: Entities on this block will sink in it and freeze, unless they are using Leather armor. Can be collected in a Bucket.
block.minecraft.glow_lichen.description: Grows in caves. Can be used as decoration.
block.minecraft.sculk_sensor.description: Emits a Redstone signal whenever it detects a sound. Cannot detect sounds through wool.
Emits a Redstone signal whenever it detects a sound with a specific intensity. The intensity is determined by giving the sensor a Redstone signal. Cannot detect sounds through wool.
block.minecraft.deepslate.description: Generates deeply in the Overworld and drops cobbled deepslate when broken. Can be used for construction.
block.minecraft.cobbled_deepslate.descri: Mined from Deepslate using a pickaxe. Can be used to craft a variety of deepslate blocks, as well as stone tools and a furnace.
block.minecraft.cobbled_deepslate_wall.d: A wall made of Cobbled Deepslate.
block.minecraft.deepslate_bricks.descrip: Made from Cobbled Deepslate. Can be used for construction and as decoration.
A wall made of Polished Deepslate.
block.minecraft.deepslate_brick_wall.des: A wall made of Deepslate Bricks.
block.minecraft.deepslate_tile_wall.desc: A wall made of Deepslate Tiles.
block.minecraft.smooth_basalt.descriptio: A smooth form of Basalt that can be acquired by smelting Basalt in a Furnace. Also generates in Amethyst Geodes. Can be used for construction.
block.minecraft.raw_iron_block.descripti: A compact way of storing Raw Iron.
block.minecraft.raw_copper_block.descrip: A compact way of storing Raw Copper.
block.minecraft.raw_gold_block.descripti: A compact way of storing Raw Gold.
block.minecraft.sculk.description: Drops experience orbs when broken. Generates in the Deep Dark or from a Sculk Catalyst.
block.minecraft.sculk_catalyst.descripti: Generates sculk around it when a mob dies nearby.
block.minecraft.sculk_shrieker.descripti: Spawns in a Warden when activated four times by a player stepping on it, projectiles or Sculk Sensor signals.
block.minecraft.sculk_vein.description: Generates in the Deep Dark or from a Sculk Catalyst. Can be used as decoration.
block.minecraft.ochre_froglight.descript: Drops from small Magma Cubes when eaten by a Temperate Frog.
block.minecraft.verdant_froglight.descri: Drops from small Magma Cubes when eaten by a Cold Frog.
block.minecraft.pearlescent_froglight.de: Drops from small Magma Cubes when eaten by a Warm Frog.
block.minecraft.frogspawn.description: Laid by Frogs in water when bred, hatching new Tadpoles after a while.
block.minecraft.reinforced_deepslate.des: An extremely tough block that generates in Ancient Cities. When destroyed, does not drop itself.
item.minecraft.name_tag.description: Used to name mobs in the world.
item.minecraft.lead.description: Used to leash mobs to the player or Fence posts.
item.minecraft.sword.description: Deals more damage than by hand.
item.minecraft.shovel.description: Used to dig dirt, grass, sand, gravel and snow faster than by hand. Shovels are required to dig snowballs.
item.minecraft.pickaxe.description: Required to mine stone-related blocks and ore.
item.minecraft.axe.description: Used to chop wood-related blocks faster than by hand.
item.minecraft.hoe.description: Used to till dirt and grass blocks to prepare for crops.
item.minecraft.flint_and_steel.descripti: Used to create fire, ignite TNT and creepers, and open a Nether portal once it has been built.
item.minecraft.apple.description: Restores 2%2$s, and can be crafted into a golden apple.
item.minecraft.bow.description: Allows for ranged attacks by using arrows.
item.minecraft.bundle.description: Can store multiple different items up to a stack.
item.minecraft.spectral_arrow.descriptio: Gives the victim a glowing outline that can be seen through blocks.
item.minecraft.dried_kelp.description: Restores 0.5%2$s. Can be eaten more quickly than most other foods.
item.minecraft.coal.description: Used as a fuel in a furnace, or crafted to make a torch.
item.minecraft.raw_copper.description: Can be smelted in a furnace to create a copper ingot.
item.minecraft.raw_iron.description: Can be smelted in a furnace to create a iron ingot.
item.minecraft.raw_gold.description: Can be smelted in a furnace to create a gold ingot.
item.minecraft.diamond.description: Use these to create very strong tools, weapons or armor.
item.minecraft.ingot.description: A shiny ingot which can be used to craft tools made from this material. Created by smelting ore in a furnace.
item.minecraft.copper_ingot.description: A shiny ingot which can be used to craft a lightning rod, copper blocks or a spyglass. Created by smelting ore in a furnace.
item.minecraft.stick.description: Used to craft torches, arrows, signs, ladders, fences and as handles for tools and weapons.
item.minecraft.bowl.description: Used to hold mushroom stew and beetroot soup. You keep the bowl when the contents have been eaten.
item.minecraft.string.description: Collected by killing a spider. Can be crafted into a Bow or Fishing Rod, or placed on the ground to create Tripwire.
item.minecraft.feather.description: Collected by killing a chicken. Can be crafted into an arrow.
item.minecraft.gunpowder.description: Collected by killing a creeper. Can be crafted into TNT or used as an ingredient for brewing potions.
item.minecraft.wheat_seeds.description: Can be planted in farmland to grow crops. Make sure there's enough light for the seeds to grow!
item.minecraft.pumpkin_seeds.description: Can be planted to grow pumpkins.
item.minecraft.melon_seeds.description: Can be planted to grow melons.
item.minecraft.wheat.description: Harvested from crops. Can be used to craft food items.
item.minecraft.flint.description: Collected by digging gravel. Can be used to craft a flint and steel.
item.minecraft.porkchop.description: Restores 1.5%2$s, or can be cooked in a furnace.
item.minecraft.cooked_porkchop.descripti: Restores 4%2$s. Created by cooking a raw porkchop in a furnace.
item.minecraft.chicken.description: Restores 1%2$s, or can be cooked in a furnace. Eating this can cause you to be poisoned.
item.minecraft.cooked_chicken.descriptio: Restores 3%2$s. Created by cooking raw chicken in a furnace.
item.minecraft.mutton.description: Restores 1%2$s, or can be cooked in a furnace.
item.minecraft.cooked_mutton.description: Restores 3%2$s. Created by cooking raw mutton in a furnace.
item.minecraft.rabbit.description: Restores 1.5%2$s, or can be cooked in a furnace.
item.minecraft.cooked_rabbit.description: Restores 2.5%2$s. Used to cook up some rabbit stew.
item.minecraft.rabbit_stew.description: Restores 5%2$s. Cooked up with some cooked rabbit, carrot, mushroom and potato.
item.minecraft.rabbit_foot.description: Used as an ingredient for brewing potions.
item.minecraft.beef.description: Restores 1.5%2$s, or can be cooked in a furnace.
item.minecraft.cooked_beef.description: Restores 4%2$s. Created by cooking raw beef in a furnace.
item.minecraft.item_frame.description: Similar to a display case, this will display the item or block placed in it.
item.minecraft.golden_apple.description: Restores 2%2$s, and regenerates health for 4 seconds. Crafted from an Apple and Gold Ingots.
item.minecraft.enchanted_golden_apple.de: Restores 2%2$s, regenerates health for 30 seconds, and grants fire resistance and damage resistance for 5 minutes. Crafted from an apple and gold blocks.
item.minecraft.bucket.description: Used to hold and transport water, lava and milk.
item.minecraft.water_bucket.description: Used to hold and transport water.
item.minecraft.lava_bucket.description: Used to hold and transport lava.
item.minecraft.pufferfish_bucket.descrip: Used to hold and transport pufferfish.
item.minecraft.salmon_bucket.description: Used to hold and transport salmon.
item.minecraft.cod_bucket.description: Used to hold and transport cod.
item.minecraft.tropical_fish_bucket.desc: Used to hold and transport tropical fish.
item.minecraft.powder_snow_bucket.descri: Used to hold and transport powder snow.
item.minecraft.axolotl_bucket.descriptio: Used to hold and transport axolotl.
item.minecraft.tadpole_bucket.descriptio: Used to hold and transport tadpole.
item.minecraft.minecart.description: Used to transport you, an animal, or a monster along rails.
item.minecraft.saddle.description: When used on a pig, it allows you to ride the pig. The pig can then be steered using a Carrot on a Stick.
item.minecraft.redstone.description: Can be placed on the ground to carry an electrical charge. When brewed with a potion it will increase the duration of the effect.
item.minecraft.snowball.description: Collected by digging snow. Can be thrown.
item.minecraft.boat.description: Used to travel in water more quickly than swimming.
item.minecraft.chest_boat.description: Used to transport goods through water.
item.minecraft.leather.description: Collected by killing a cow. Can be crafted into armor or used to make books.
item.minecraft.milk_bucket.description: Used to hold and transport milk.
item.minecraft.brick.description: Baked from clay in a furnace.
item.minecraft.clay_ball.description: Can be baked into bricks in a furnace.
item.minecraft.paper.description: Used to create books, maps, and fireworks.
item.minecraft.book.description: Can be used to create bookshelves or enchanted to make Enchanted Books.
item.minecraft.slime_ball.description: Collected by killing a slime. Can be used as an ingredient for brewing potions or crafted to make Sticky Pistons.
item.minecraft.chest_minecart.descriptio: Used to transport goods along rails.
item.minecraft.furnace_minecart.descript: Will move along rails and can push other minecarts when coal is put in it.
item.minecraft.tnt_minecart.description: A type of Minecart that acts as a moving TNT block.
item.minecraft.hopper_minecart.descripti: A special type of Minecart that functions similarly to a Hopper. It will collect items lying on tracks and from containers above it.
item.minecraft.command_block_minecart.de: Used to execute commands on the move!
item.minecraft.egg.description: Dropped randomly by chickens. Can be crafted into food items.
item.minecraft.clock.description: Displays positions of the Sun and Moon.
item.minecraft.glowstone_dust.descriptio: Collected by mining Glowstone. Can be crafted to make Glowstone blocks again or brewed with a potion to increase the potency of the effect.
item.minecraft.cod.description: Restores 1%2$s, or can be cooked in a furnace. Can be fed to an ocelot to tame it.
item.minecraft.salmon.description: Restores 1%2$s, or can be cooked in a furnace. Can be fed to an ocelot to tame it.
item.minecraft.pufferfish.description: Restores 0.5%2$s however it is poisonous. Can also be used as an ingredient in brewing potions.
item.minecraft.cooked_cod.description: Restores 2.5%2$s. Created by cooking a raw Cod in a furnace.
item.minecraft.cooked_salmon.description: Restores 3%2$s. Created by cooking a raw salmon in a furnace.
item.minecraft.music_disc_generic.descri: Collected by getting a skeleton to kill a creeper. Can be played in a jukebox.
item.minecraft.music_disc_pigstep.descri: Collected in chests in Bastion Remnants. Can be played in a jukebox.
item.minecraft.music_disc_otherside.desc: Collected in underground chests. Can be played in a jukebox.
item.minecraft.music_disc_5.description: Crafted from Disc Fragments. Can be played in a jukebox.
item.minecraft.music_disc_relic.descript: Found buried in suspicious gravel. Can be played in a jukebox.
item.minecraft.bone.description: Collected by killing a skeleton. Can be crafted into bone meal, or fed to a wolf to tame it.
item.minecraft.ink_sac.description: Used as a dye to create Black Wool.
item.minecraft.red_dye.description: Used as a dye to create Red Wool.
item.minecraft.green_dye.description: Used as a dye to create Green Wool.
item.minecraft.cocoa_beans.description: Used as a dye to create Brown Wool, as an ingredient in cookies, or to grow Cocoa Pods.
item.minecraft.lapis_lazuli.description: Used in enchanting and as a dye to create Blue Wool.
item.minecraft.purple_dye.description: Used as a dye to create Purple Wool.
item.minecraft.cyan_dye.description: Used as a dye to create Cyan Wool.
item.minecraft.light_gray_dye.descriptio: Used as a dye to create Light Gray Wool. (Note: Light Gray Dye can also be made by combining Gray Dye with Bone Meal, letting you make four Light Gray Dyes instead of three.)
item.minecraft.gray_dye.description: Used as a dye to create Gray Wool.
item.minecraft.pink_dye.description: Used as a dye to create Pink Wool.
item.minecraft.lime_dye.description: Used as a dye to create Lime Wool.
item.minecraft.yellow_dye.description: Used as a dye to create Yellow Wool.
item.minecraft.light_blue_dye.descriptio: Used as a dye to create Light Blue Wool.
item.minecraft.magenta_dye.description: Used as a dye to create Magenta Wool.
item.minecraft.orange_dye.description: Used as a dye to create Orange Wool.
item.minecraft.bone_meal.description: Used to instantly grow crops, trees, tall grass, huge mushrooms and flowers; and as a dye to create White Wool.
item.minecraft.blue_dye.description: Used as a dye to create Blue Wool.
item.minecraft.black_dye.description: Used as a dye to create Black Wool.
item.minecraft.brown_dye.description: Used as a dye to create Brown Wool.
item.minecraft.white_dye.description: Used as a dye to create White Wool.
item.minecraft.sugar.description: Used in the cake recipe, and as an ingredient for brewing potions.
item.minecraft.amethyst_shard.descriptio: Acquired by mining Budding Amethyst. Can be used to make Tinted Glass and a Spyglass.
item.minecraft.spyglass.description: Can be used to zoom into far distances.
item.minecraft.glow_berries.description: Restores 0.5%2$s. Can also be planted under blocks to grow Cave Vines.
item.minecraft.disc_fragment_5.descripti: Can be used to craft a Music Disc.
block.minecraft.bed.description: Used to forward time from any time at night to morning if all the players in the world are in bed, and changes the spawn point of the player. Beds can be crafted in various colors by using dyed wool.
block.minecraft.repeater.description: Used in Redstone circuits as a repeater, a delayer, and/or a diode.
block.minecraft.comparator.description: Used in Redstone circuits to maintain, compare, or subtract signal strength, or to measure certain block states.
block.minecraft.powered_rail.description: When powered, accelerates minecarts that pass over it. When unpowered, causes minecarts to stop on it.
block.minecraft.detector_rail.descriptio: Functions like a Pressure Plate (sends a Redstone signal when powered) but can only be activated by a Minecart.
block.minecraft.activator_rail.descripti: A type of rail that can enable or disable Minecarts with Hoppers and trigger Minecarts with TNT.
item.minecraft.filled_map.description: Will create an image of an area explored while held. This can be used for path-finding.
item.minecraft.shears.description: Used to obtain wool from sheep and to harvest Cobwebs, Leaves, and Seagrass blocks.
item.minecraft.rotten_flesh.description: Restores 2%2$s. Eating this can cause you to be poisoned.
item.minecraft.ender_pearl.description: Dropped by Endermen when they die. Throwing an Ender Pearl will teleport the player to wherever it lands, at the cost of some health.
item.minecraft.blaze_rod.description: Used in potion brewing, and for locating Strongholds. Dropped by Blazes who tend to be found near or in Nether Fortresses.
item.minecraft.ghast_tear.description: Used in potion brewing. Dropped by Ghasts when they die.
item.minecraft.nether_wart.description: Used in potion brewing. This can be found naturally growing in Nether Fortresses. It can also be planted on Soul Sand.
item.minecraft.potion.description: Can be drank to receive effects.
item.minecraft.splash_potion.description: When thrown, will give an effect to nearby mobs and players.
item.minecraft.lingering_potion.descript: When thrown, will linger around for a few seconds, giving an effect to nearby mobs and players.
item.minecraft.end_crystal.description: Heals the Ender Dragon, and can be used to respawn it. Explodes when attacked.
item.minecraft.gold_nugget.description: Dropped by Zombie Pigmen when they die. Zombie Pigmen can be found in the Nether. Used as an ingredient for brewing potions.
item.minecraft.glass_bottle.description: Can be filled with water, and used as the starting ingredient for a potion in the Brewing Stand.
item.minecraft.spider_eye.description: This is a poisonous food and brewing item. Dropped when a Spider or Cave Spider is killed by a player.
item.minecraft.fermented_spider_eye.desc: Used in potion brewing; mainly to create potions with a negative effect.
item.minecraft.blaze_powder.description: Used in potion brewing, or crafted with other items to make Eye of Ender or Magma Cream.
item.minecraft.cauldron.description: Used to mix dyes and dye armor, or store Potions and make Tipped Arrows. Filled with water by rain or with a bucket of water.
block.minecraft.brewing_stand.descriptio: Used for making Potions and Splash Potions.
item.minecraft.ender_eye.description: When thrown, will show the direction to an End Portal. When twelve of these are placed in the End Portal Frames, the End Portal will be activated.
item.minecraft.spawn_egg.description: When thrown can spawn a creature of the type indicated.
item.minecraft.experience_bottle.descrip: When thrown, it drops Experience Orbs which increase your experience points when collected.
item.minecraft.fire_charge.description: Useful for setting things on fire, or for indiscriminately starting fires when fired from a Dispenser.
item.minecraft.writable_book.description: A Book that can be written in.
item.minecraft.written_book.description: A book signed by the author (cannot be written in).
item.minecraft.flower_pot.description: Used as a decoration. Flowers, Saplings, Cacti and Mushrooms can be planted in it.
item.minecraft.map.description: When used becomes a map of the part of the world that you are in, and gets filled in as you explore.
item.minecraft.carrot.description: Restores 1.5%2$s, and can be crafted into a golden carrot. Can be planted in farmland.
item.minecraft.golden_carrot.description: Restores 3%2$s. Crafted from a carrot and gold nuggets.
item.minecraft.potato.description: Restores 0.5%2$s, or can be cooked in a furnace. This can be planted in farmland.
item.minecraft.baked_potato.description: Restores 2.5%2$s. Created by cooking a potato in a furnace.
item.minecraft.poisonous_potato.descript: Restores 1%2$s. Eating this can cause you to become poisoned.
item.minecraft.carrot_on_a_stick.descrip: Used to control a saddled pig when riding on it.
item.minecraft.nether_star.description: Dropped by the Wither, used in crafting Beacons.
item.minecraft.enchanted_book.descriptio: Used with an Anvil to enchant weapons, tools or armor.
item.minecraft.firework_rocket.descripti: When activated, creates colorful explosions. The color, effect, shape and fade are determined by the Firework Star used when the Firework is created.
item.minecraft.firework_star.description: Used to determine the color, effect and shape of a Firework.
item.minecraft.nether_brick.description: Created by smelting Netherrack in a furnace. Can be crafted into Nether Brick blocks.
item.minecraft.quartz.description: Created by mining Nether Quartz Ore. Can be crafted into a Block of Quartz.
item.minecraft.armor_stand.description: Can be equipped to display armor and other decorative items such as mob heads.
item.minecraft.iron_horse_armor.descript: A special type of Armor that can be equipped to a horse. Provides 2.5%3$s.
item.minecraft.golden_horse_armor.descri: A special type of Armor that can be equipped to a horse. Provides 3.5%3$s.
item.minecraft.diamond_horse_armor.descr: A special type of Armor that can be equipped to a horse. Provides 5.5%3$s.
item.minecraft.leather_horse_armor.descr: A special type of Armor that can be dyed and equipped to a horse. Provides 1.5%3$s.
item.minecraft.prismarine_shard.descript: Dropped by Guardians and Elder Guardians. Can be used in crafting Prismarine and Sea Lanterns.
item.minecraft.prismarine_crystals.descr: Obtained from Sea Lanterns or by defeating Guardians and Elder Guardians. Can be used in crafting Sea Lanterns.
item.minecraft.chorus_fruit.description: Eating restores 2%2$s, and may teleport the player. Can be cooked in a Furnace.
item.minecraft.popped_chorus_fruit.descr: Created by cooking Chorus Fruit in a Furnace. Used to craft End Rods and Purpur blocks.
item.minecraft.beetroot.description: Restores 0.5%2$s when eaten. Can also be crafted into Rose Red dye, or Beetroot Soup.
item.minecraft.beetroot_seeds.descriptio: Can be planted in farmland to grow beetroot.
item.minecraft.dragon_breath.description: Used in potion brewing. Obtained by capturing the Ender Dragon's acid breath in a Glass Bottle.
item.minecraft.elytra.description: Allows the player to glide when worn.
item.minecraft.totem_of_undying.descript: Prevents the holder from dying, but breaks in the process. Dropped by Evokers.
item.minecraft.shulker_shell.description: Sometimes dropped by Shulkers. Can be used to craft a Shulker Box.
item.minecraft.iron_nugget.description: Created by smelting Iron armour and tools in a Furnace. Can be crafted into an Iron Ingot.
item.minecraft.knowledge_book.descriptio: Using this unlocks new crafting recipes.
item.minecraft.debug_stick.description: Allows operators to modify block states.
item.minecraft.trident.description: A hybrid weapon that can be thrown, or used to stab. Can receive a variety of useful enchantments to make it particularly effective in water or rain.
item.minecraft.scute.description: Dropped by baby Sea Turtles when they grow up. Used to craft Turtle Shell helmets.
item.minecraft.turtle_helmet.description: Gives the user 1%3$s when worn, and lets them breathe underwater for longer.
item.minecraft.phantom_membrane.descript: Used in potion brewing, or to repair Elytra.
item.minecraft.nautilus_shell.descriptio: Can be found by fishing, or killing Drowned. Used to craft a Conduit.
item.minecraft.heart_of_the_sea.descript: Found in buried treasure chests. Used to craft a Conduit.
item.minecraft.crossbow.description: A powerful alternative to the bow that can use arrows or fireworks.
item.minecraft.suspicious_stew.descripti: Restores 3%2$s. Gives the player an unknown effect.
item.minecraft.banner_pattern.descriptio: Can be used to customise Banners.
item.minecraft.sweet_berries.description: Tasty Berries that can be eaten or used to plant a Sweet Berry Bush.
item.minecraft.honey_bottle.description: Restores 3%2$s and cures poison. Can be used to craft Honey Blocks.
item.minecraft.honeycomb.description: Harvested from bee nests with shears. Can be used to craft Candles and Honeycomb Blocks.
item.minecraft.netherite_scrap.descripti: Created by smelting Ancient Debris. Can be crafted with Gold Ingots to make Netherite Ingots.
item.minecraft.netherite_ingot.descripti: Crafted with Gold Ingots and Netherite Ingots. Can be used to upgrade Diamond tools in a Smithing Table.
Can be used to lead Striders.
item.minecraft.glow_ink_sac.description: Dropped by Glow Squids on death. Can be used to craft Glow Item Frames or to make text in Signs glow.
item.minecraft.glow_item_frame.descripti: An Item Frame that glows in the dark.
item.minecraft.echo_shard.description: Found in Ancient Cities. Used to craft Recovery Compasses.
item.minecraft.goat_horn.description: Dropped when Goats ram into a block. Plays a loud noise on use.
item.minecraft.armor_trim_smithing_templ: Can be trimmed onto an armor piece in a Smithing Table.
item.minecraft.netherite_upgrade_smithin: Can be combined with Diamond equipment and a Netherite ingot to upgrade the gear to Netherite.
item.minecraft.pottery_sherd.description: Can be used to create a unique Decorated Pot.
block.minecraft.suspicious_block.descrip: Can be brushed to collect a buried item.
block.minecraft.torchflower.description: Grows when Torchflower Seeds are planted. Can be used as decoration.
block.minecraft.pitcher_plant.descriptio: Grows when a Pitcher Pod is planted. Can be used as decoration.
item.minecraft.torchflower_seeds.descrip: Grow into a Torchflower and are obtained by letting a Sniffer sniff them out of the ground.
item.minecraft.pitcher_pod.description: Grows into a Pitcher Plant and is obtained by letting a Sniffer sniff it out of the ground.
block.minecraft.pink_petals.description: Tiny pink flowers that can be used to craft pink dye.
block.minecraft.sniffer_egg.description: Grows into a Sniffer. The process is quicker if the Sniffer Egg is placed on moss.
block.minecraft.chiseled_bookshelf.descr: Can be used to hold up to six books.
block.minecraft.hanging_sign.description: A special type of sign that can be hung on a wall or ceiling.
item.minecraft.brush.description: Can be used to brush suspicious sand or gravel.
entity.minecraft.allay.description: Can be given an item, and will look for a dropped item of same type. Once it finds one, it will drop it to the player who gave it an item or its linked Note Block.
entity.minecraft.axolotl.description: Generates in Lush Caves and can be caught in a bucket. Can breathe out of water for 5 minutes before having to return. Can be caught in a Bucket and will help fight against aquatic mobs.
entity.minecraft.bat.description: These flying creatures are found in caverns or other large enclosed spaces.
entity.minecraft.bee.description: Lives in Bee Nests and produces honey from a flower's nectar.
entity.minecraft.blaze.description: Found in the Nether, mostly inside Nether Fortresses. Drops Blaze Rods when killed.
entity.minecraft.cat.description: Found as strays in villages and witch huts. Can be tamed using Salmon or Cod.
entity.minecraft.chicken.description: Drops feathers when killed, and also randomly lays eggs.
entity.minecraft.cod.description: A tasty fish that travels in shoals.
entity.minecraft.cow.description: Drops leather when killed. Can also be milked with a bucket.
entity.minecraft.creeper.description: Explodes if you get too close!
entity.minecraft.dolphin.description: A playful sea creature that will follow swimming players, and help them swim faster! Feed fish to a Dolphin and it might help in other ways.
entity.minecraft.donkey.description: These animals can be tamed, and can then be ridden. They can have a chest attached.
entity.minecraft.drowned.description: A Zombie that has drowned. Sometimes carries a Trident.
entity.minecraft.elder_guardian.descript: A hostile creature found in Ocean Monuments. A much stronger version of the Guardian.
entity.minecraft.ender_dragon.descriptio: This is a large black dragon found in The End.
entity.minecraft.enderman.description: Will attack you if you look at it. Can also move blocks around.
entity.minecraft.endermite.description: There is a small chance using an Ender pearl will spawn one. Will attack you if you are nearby.
entity.minecraft.evoker.description: Evokers live in Woodland Mansions. They attack with Fangs, and summon Vexes.
entity.minecraft.fox.description: Attacks small creatures and loves to eat.
entity.minecraft.frog.description: Grows from Tadpoles and eats Magma Cubes.
entity.minecraft.ghast.description: Fires flaming balls at you that explode on contact.
entity.minecraft.glow_squid.description: Glows in the dark and drops Glow Ink Sacs when killed.
entity.minecraft.goat.description: Generates in the mountains. Can jump very high and randomly rams into entities.
entity.minecraft.guardian.description: A hostile creature found near Ocean Monuments. Watch out for its laser!
entity.minecraft.hoglin.description: A hostile creature generated in the Nether. Drops porkchops on death and can be bred with Crimson Fungi!
entity.minecraft.horse.description: These animals can be tamed, and can then be ridden.
entity.minecraft.husk.description: A zombie that doesn't burn in sunlight. Its attacks will make you hungry!
entity.minecraft.ravager.description: Hostile mobs that appear during Village Raids. Blocking their attacks with a Shield can stun them!
entity.minecraft.illusioner.description: A powerful Illager that casts spells. Is also armed with a bow.
entity.minecraft.llama.description: Llamas can be tamed and ridden. By using a lead, Llamas can be organised into long caravans and used to haul items.
entity.minecraft.magma_cube.description: Found in The Nether. Splits into smaller Magma Cubes when damaged.
entity.minecraft.mooshroom.description: Makes mushroom stew when used with a bowl. Drops mushrooms and becomes a normal cow when sheared.
entity.minecraft.mule.description: Born when a Horse and a Donkey breed. These animals can be tamed, and can then be ridden and carry chests.
entity.minecraft.ocelot.description: Found in Jungles. Can be tamed using Raw Salmon or Cod. You will need to let the Ocelot approach you though; any sudden movements will scare it away.
entity.minecraft.panda.description: A Jungle animal that can have six different personalities, and really loves Bamboo.
entity.minecraft.parrot.description: Parrots are colorful birds that inhabit Jungles. They enjoy perching on shoulders and mimicking sounds, and dislike Chocolate Cookies.
entity.minecraft.phantom.description: A creature of nightmares that hunts tired players.
entity.minecraft.pig.description: Drops porkchops when killed. Can be ridden by using a saddle.
entity.minecraft.piglin.description: Piglins are generated in the Nether and love Gold. Try bartering a Gold Ingot with them!
entity.minecraft.piglin_brute.descriptio: A powerful Piglin that does not get distracted by gold. Generated in Bastion Remnants.
entity.minecraft.pillager.description: Hostile Mob that uses a Crossbow!
entity.minecraft.polar_bear.description: Initially docile, but an adult will become aggressive if you attack it or its cub.
entity.minecraft.pufferfish.description: A fish that puffs up when scared, poisoning anything that touches it!
entity.minecraft.rabbit.description: A harmless creature. May drop a rabbit hide or a rabbit's foot when killed.
entity.minecraft.salmon.description: A tasty fish that prefers colder Oceans, and can swim up rivers.
entity.minecraft.sheep.description: Drops wool when sheared (if it has not already been sheared). Can be dyed to make its wool a different color.
entity.minecraft.shulker.description: A hostile mob found in End Cities. They hide in their shells to blend in with Purpur Blocks around them.
entity.minecraft.silverfish.description: Attracts nearby hidden Silverfish when attacked. Hides in stone blocks.
entity.minecraft.skeleton.description: Fires arrows at you. Drops arrows when killed.
entity.minecraft.skeleton_horse.descript: A skeletal horse created when lightning strikes!
entity.minecraft.slime.description: Splits into smaller Slimes when damaged.
entity.minecraft.snow_golem.description: The Snow Golem can be created by players using snow blocks and a pumpkin. They will throw snowballs at their creator's enemies.
entity.minecraft.spider.description: Attacks you when you are close to it. Can climb walls. Drops string when killed.
entity.minecraft.stray.description: Armed with Tipped Arrows. Can afflict you with Slowness for 30 seconds.
entity.minecraft.strider.description: Generates on lava oceans in The Nether. Can be ridden with a Saddle and controlled using a Warped Fungus in a Stick.
entity.minecraft.tadpole.description: Tadpoles are generated from Frogspawn laid by Frogs. Will turn into a Frog after some time, with its color depending on the biome it grows in.
entity.minecraft.tropical_fish.descripti: A colorful fish that prefers warmer Oceans.
entity.minecraft.turtle.description: An amphibious mob that always returns home to lay its eggs. Baby Sea Turtles drop a Scute when they grow up.
entity.minecraft.vex.description: Vexes are ghostly entities that are summoned by Evokers. They are capable of flying, and can pass through any block unharmed.
entity.minecraft.villager.description: Found in villages, villagers will offer to sell items to the player depending on their profession.
entity.minecraft.wandering_trader.descri: A special trader who roams the world collecting and selling rare and exotic items.
entity.minecraft.iron_golem.description: Appears in Villages to protect them. Can be created using Iron Blocks and Pumpkins.
entity.minecraft.vindicator.description: Vindicators are hostile and armed with an Axe.
entity.minecraft.warden.description: Extremely powerful, spawning when Sculk Catalysts are triggered. Cannot see anything; can only locate entities via sound.
entity.minecraft.witch.description: Found in swamps. Attacks by throwing Potions, and drops Potions when killed.
entity.minecraft.wither.description: Can be creating using Wither Skulls and Soul Sand. Fires exploding skulls at you.
entity.minecraft.wither_skeleton.descrip: Armed with a sword. Can afflict you with Wither, which drains your health.
entity.minecraft.wolf.description: Docile until attacked, when they will attack you back. Can be tamed using bones, which causes the wolf to follow you around and attack anything that attacks you.
entity.minecraft.zoglin.description: Created when a Hoglin zombifies in the Overworld. Attacks any mobs in sight.
entity.minecraft.zombie.description: Attacks you when you are close to it.
entity.minecraft.zombie_horse.descriptio: An undead horse. Cannot be tamed!
entity.minecraft.zombified_piglin.descri: Initially docile, but will attack in groups if you attack one.
entity.minecraft.zombie_villager.descrip: A Villager that has been zombified! Is there a cure?
item.minecraft.tipped_arrow.effect.empty: An arrow that applies a potion effect based on what it is tipped with.
item.minecraft.tipped_arrow.effect.water: An arrow that applies a potion effect based on what it is tipped with.
item.minecraft.tipped_arrow.effect.munda: An arrow that applies a potion effect based on what it is tipped with.
item.minecraft.tipped_arrow.effect.thick: An arrow that applies a potion effect based on what it is tipped with.
item.minecraft.tipped_arrow.effect.awkwa: An arrow that applies a potion effect based on what it is tipped with.
item.minecraft.tipped_arrow.effect.night: A player hit with this arrow will be able to see in the dark.
item.minecraft.tipped_arrow.effect.invis: A player, animal, or monster hit with this arrow will become invisible.
item.minecraft.tipped_arrow.effect.leapi: A player hit with this arrow will jump higher.
item.minecraft.tipped_arrow.effect.fire_: A player, animal, or monster hit with this arrow will become immune to damage from fire, lava, and Blaze ranged attacks.
item.minecraft.tipped_arrow.effect.swift: A player, animal, or monster hit with this arrow will move and sprint faster, and jump farther.
item.minecraft.tipped_arrow.effect.slown: A player, animal, or monster hit with this arrow will move and sprint slower, and not jump as far.
item.minecraft.tipped_arrow.effect.water: A player hit with this arrow will be able to breath normally underwater.
item.minecraft.tipped_arrow.effect.heali: A player, animal, or monster hit with this arrow will recover some health.
item.minecraft.tipped_arrow.effect.harmi: A player, animal, or monster hit with this arrow will be hurt more than usual.
item.minecraft.tipped_arrow.effect.poiso: A player, animal, or monster hit with this arrow will take additional damage over time.
item.minecraft.tipped_arrow.effect.regen: A player, animal, or monster hit with this arrow will recover some health over time.
item.minecraft.tipped_arrow.effect.stren: A player or monster hit with this arrow will deal more damage.
item.minecraft.tipped_arrow.effect.weakn: A player or monster hit with this arrow will deal less damage.
item.minecraft.tipped_arrow.effect.levit: A player, animal, or monster hit with this arrow will levitate.
A player, animal, or monster hit with this arrow is more likely to get better items from fishing.
item.minecraft.tipped_arrow.effect.turtl: A player, animal, or monster hit with this arrow will have increased damage resistance, but greatly reduced speed.
item.minecraft.tipped_arrow.effect.slow_: A player, animal, or monster hit with this arrow will fall much more slowly than usual.

item.minecraft.potion.effect.mundane.des: Used as the base of all potions. Use in a brewing stand to create potions.
item.minecraft.potion.effect.thick.descr: Used as the base of all potions. Use in a brewing stand to create potions.
item.minecraft.potion.effect.awkward.des: Used as the base of all potions. Use in a brewing stand to create potions.
item.minecraft.potion.effect.night_visio: Makes dark areas appear as if in daylight, even under water.
item.minecraft.potion.effect.invisibilit: Makes affected players, animals and monsters invisible.
item.minecraft.potion.effect.leaping.des: Increases the jump height of the affected player.
item.minecraft.potion.effect.fire_resist: Makes the affected players, animals, and monsters immune to damage from fire, lava, and ranged Blaze attacks.

item.minecraft.potion.effect.slowness.de: Reduces the movement speed of affected players, animals, and monsters. Also reduces a player's sprinting speed, jumping length and field of view.

item.minecraft.potion.effect.weakness.de: Reduces the damage caused by affected players and monsters when attacking.
